text: quotes theme - is there a way to display sales snippets (<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/conversations/use-snippets>) in a custom quotes theme? Would like to do a conditional like, if product property = x show this terms and conditions snippet. I could do this with a code variable but trying to see if I can make this content client facing so they can update it without editing the code.
<@UG7S8J18D> you can use snippets in - comments to buyer or T&C fields.
thanks I see that but was trying to code the logic into the template so the user doesn't have to manually insert the snippet
got it <@UG7S8J18D>, we can put conditional logic and i think you're aware of that
But how would I query the snippet content object? I can just grab quote and deal but not snippets
